quoteLast: , the last division of the wheel had been reached. Craft then took a spoonful of plaster, and, inserting his hand carefully inside of the case, pulled out the tube from Cobb's mouth, and poured the half-liquid plaster into the hole in the cast.
title: A. D. 2000
author: Fuller, Alvarado M. (Alvarado Mortimer), 1851-1924; Bretsnyder, W. [Illustrator]

quoteFirst: 4″ in diameter, though still an object of beauty in the morning sky. She rises at 4:03 a. m. on the 1st; at
quoteLast: on the 16th, and at 5:10 a. m. on the 31st. Her motion is direct and equals 38° 30′ of arc. On the 14th, at 4:37 a. m., she is 1° 15′ south of the moon.
title: The Chautauquan, Vol. 05, December 1884, No. 3
